descriptionNullable:
### Context

I have always been interested in discovering if and how is Elon Musk influencing the pricing of Bitcoin (and lately Dodgecoin). The tweets scraped here can help identify this information, as well as correlate to other events in the industry.


### Content

Elon Musk's tweets, scraped from 2009 to present.
Columns: `['id', 'conversation_id', 'created_at', 'date', 'time', 'timezone',
       'user_id', 'username', 'name', 'place', 'tweet', 'language', 'mentions',
       'urls', 'photos', 'replies_count', 'retweets_count', 'likes_count',
       'hashtags', 'cashtags', 'link', 'retweet', 'quote_url', 'video',
       'thumbnail', 'near', 'geo', 'source', 'user_rt_id', 'user_rt',
       'retweet_id', 'reply_to', 'retweet_date', 'translate', 'trans_src',
       'trans_dest']`


### Acknowledgements

Thank you lots to [Twint](https://github.com/twintproject/twint), an amazing library, easy to use, that makes tweet scraping so easy, without the fuss of APIs and coding.
title: All Elon Musk's Tweets
subtitle: 2010 - 2021 tweets by Elon Musk
description:
### Context

I have always been interested in discovering if and how is Elon Musk influencing the pricing of Bitcoin (and lately Dodgecoin). The tweets scraped here can help identify this information, as well as correlate to other events in the industry.


### Content

Elon Musk's tweets, scraped from 2009 to present.
Columns: `['id', 'conversation_id', 'created_at', 'date', 'time', 'timezone',
       'user_id', 'username', 'name', 'place', 'tweet', 'language', 'mentions',
       'urls', 'photos', 'replies_count', 'retweets_count', 'likes_count',
       'hashtags', 'cashtags', 'link', 'retweet', 'quote_url', 'video',
       'thumbnail', 'near', 'geo', 'source', 'user_rt_id', 'user_rt',
       'retweet_id', 'reply_to', 'retweet_date', 'translate', 'trans_src',
       'trans_dest']`


### Acknowledgements

Thank you lots to [Twint](https://github.com/twintproject/twint), an amazing library, easy to use, that makes tweet scraping so easy, without the fuss of APIs and coding.
